Re: change the size of labels generated by " ppl xlab/ylab"

  • To: gaoxw <gaorz0@xxxxxxx>
  • Subject: Re: change the size of labels generated by " ppl xlab/ylab"
  • From: Billy Kessler <kessler@xxxxxxxxxxxxx>
  • Date: Fri, 22 Mar 2002 08:35:55 +1100 (EST)
  • Cc: Ferret <ferret_users@xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx>
  • In-reply-to: <20020321162413.3472C1C92B33C@sm6.163.com>
  • Sender: owner-ferret_users@xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
To change the default size of the various labels:

PPL LABSET,MAIN_LABEL,X_LABEL,Y_LABEL

where MAIN_LABEL, X_LABEL, Y_LABEL are the character heights of each
of these in inches.

Similarly, another useful one is:

PPL AXLSZE,XSIZE,YSIZE

which changes the default height of the axis labels.

Billy K
